item.title: R to @LukeLukecharles: Nah Tobey Maguire had a Hollywood track record, don’t get me wrong Boseman deserved more, but this is a bad example

item.title: R to @SpaceGamer22: If you read NME in the 00s you’d recognise her name to be fair, but I had no idea she was such an asshole until now

item.title: R to @Lauren_Southern: Imagine if half the crown stories out there started with “One of Hollywood’s white men…”
item.dc:creator: @drunkenwerewolf
item.description: Imagine if half the crown stories out there started with “One of Hollywood’s white men…”

item.title: R to @CuratorPolly: Same, mine was born inMarch - no such luck!

item.title: R to @ShreeveCarol: It’s over if we don’t listen to all claims of victimisation, sure. Amber Heard isn’t just imperfect there’s clear evidence to demonstrate she’s an abuser.
item.dc:creator: @drunkenwerewolf
item.description: It’s over if we don’t listen to all claims of victimisation, sure. Amber Heard isn’t just imperfect there’s clear evidence to demonstrate she’s an abuser.

item.title: R to @DGruffudd: Unfortunately those claiming misogyny don’t really have an understanding of the word or the complexities of feminism. It’s a cheap response to a poorly thought through opinion.
item.dc:creator: @drunkenwerewolf
item.description: Unfortunately those claiming misogyny don’t really have an understanding of the word or the complexities of feminism. It’s a cheap response to a poorly thought through opinion.

item.title: RT by @drunkenwerewolf: I do strongly feel that if only Bristol got to vote France would have done a lot better

item.description: I do strongly feel that if only Bristol got to vote France would have done a lot better

item.title: R to @L3GSV: We have astroturf in our front garden and it’s a fucking nightmare, I look so stupid hoovering it. Real grass is MUCH nicer and actually easier to manage!!!!
item.dc:creator: @drunkenwerewolf
item.description: We have astroturf in our front garden and it’s a fucking nightmare, I look so stupid hoovering it. Real grass is MUCH nicer and actually easier to manage!!!!

item.title: R to @nadineshah: Nadine you’re an amazing creative, caring and empowering woman. The times we spoke still tickle me. Please feel free to call if you need an impartial ear xxxx

item.title: R to @philjardine01: Also how stretched NHS staff already are. Community staff are redeployed to support covid & burned out from past two years. We don’t have resources to support post op discharges.
item.dc:creator: @drunkenwerewolf
